"'Walls'" is a song by the progressive rock band Yes, from their 1994 album
[[Talk (Yes album)|Talk]]. It was a rock radio hit for the band, reaching number
24 on [[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]] Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks chart.
